metadata.description: As showcased in Pink Floyd's own official CD box set Shine On, the Pink Floyd comics chronicle rock's most enigmatic psychedelic warriors, from their early days with stoner icon Syd Barrett, through their split and later reformation. Art and story by Ken Landgraf, Spike Steffenhagen, Jay Allen Sanford, and more, the collection includes additional material, bringing the saga up to 2010.
metadata.name: Rock N Roll Comics, Vol. 1
